attributes.action: changing the law on making false allegations
attributes.additional_details:
Changing the law on making false allegations
Ministry of Justice
We need to get the law changed on how we deal with false allegations or accusations about kids neglect and or bad treatment of them. This needs to be dealt with in accordance with time wasting time of a precious service (Social services). A fine or maybe more severe if happens more than once.
Families should not have to face this treatment in this day and age.
